column10: The entire Ballston area needs protected bike lanes along Fairfax Drive, Glebe Drive, and Wilson Boulevard. I'm a bike commuter and I love riding through Ballston - it is super sketchy, though. Lots of auto traffic with an unprotected bike lane = not good
